pid.title: Persistent Identifier
pid.description: PID that links to a landing page

pref_label.title: Title
pref_label.description: Service title. For an ARCHLAB service, this could be e.g. 'Access to KIK-IRPA Archives', for the other platforms, this could be the name of the technique.

scope_note.title: Service Summary
scope_note.description: A brief description of a specific technical or access service offered, such as the use of X to investigate Y

service_readiness_level.title: Service Readiness Level
service_readiness_level.description: This scale is directly based on the standard - Technology readiness levels (TRLs), adapted for heritage science, which are a method for estimating the maturity of the services being offered. For more details see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Technology_readiness_level

service_operating_languages.title: Operating Languages
service_operating_languages.description: What languages can the team operate in or what language is a tool presented in

service_techniques.title: Service Techniques
service_techniques.description: A list of the analytical techniques carried out within this service. The terms are taken from the Research Vocabularies Australia (https://vocabs.ardc.edu.au/viewById/650).

enum: Combustion gas chromatography isotopic ratio mass spectrometry
Continuous flow isotope ratio mass spectrometry
Desorption electrospray ionization orbitrap mass spectrometry
Dual inlet isotope ratio mass spectrometry
Elemental analysis isotope ratio mass spectrometry
Energy dispersive electron induced X-ray spectrometry
Energy dispersive X-ray spectral data 2D raster
Fourier transform ion cyclotron resonance mass spectrometry
High resolution inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (deprecated)
Inductively coupled plasma optical emission spectrometry
Laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry
Laser ablation resonance ionization mass spectrometry
Laser ablation split stream mass spectrometry
Liquid inlet inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry
Microprobe two step laser mass spectrometry
Mini cryogen free measurement system for thermal conductivity
Multi collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry
Negative ion thermal ionization mass spectrometry
Neutron irradiation noble gas mass spectrometry
Pre irradiation group concentration neutron activation analysis
Positive ion thermal ionization mass spectrometry
Pyrolysis gas chromatography flame ionization detection
Quadrupole inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry
Quantitative analysis electron induced X-ray spectrometry
Quantitative analysis particle induced X-ray spectrometry
Resonance ionization time of flight noble gas mass spectrometry
Sector field inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry
Seismic velocity and ultrasonic elastic constant measurement
Solid state nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy
Spherical cell bulk thermal conductivity analysis
Stepped heating carbon and nitrogen isotopic analysis
Temperature programmed desorption electron probe analysis
Wavelength dispersive electron induced X-ray spectrometry
X-ray absorption near edge structure spectrometry

provider_id.title: Provider ID
provider_id.description: An actor (organisation or person) offering this service, as defined in the system.

provider_roles.title: Provider Roles
provider_roles.description: This value should be replaced with a controlled list

service_contact.title: Service Contacts
service_contact.description: Contact details for the service; this can be personal or group contact details

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If internal references are used this data can be stored there, if external IDs are used a specific email address may be required.

research_disciplines.title: Research Disciplines
research_disciplines.description: Which domains or disciplines has a given service worked within, has experience within.

measurableProperties.title: Measurable property
measurableProperties.description: Measurable properties and materials that can be studied by this service

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: Materials of which the selected measurable property can be studied. This field is connected to an extensive controlled list.

enum: coco de mer seed pod (plant material)

service_methods.title: Method statements for the activities in the service
service_methods.description: Service related method statements should be defined in the system and represent the procedures for using individual pieces of equipment or software systems used within the service - detail of setup, methodology, procedures, etc. should all be described within this document and is also directly attached to relevant the Tool (equipment or software) records. Linked to the method model

service_resources.title: Collections, Objects, Samples and Archives
service_resources.description: Research resources made accessible by the service should be defined in the system and represent the heritage collections, objects, samples, archives, other research resources directly provided by the service.

service_limitations.title: Service Limitations
service_limitations.description: Description of any limitations in the access provision by the service.

team_member_id.title: Person ID
team_member_id.description: An actor as defined in the system. Linked to Person Model or ORCID

team_member_roles.title: Person Roles
team_member_roles.description: This value should be replaced with a controlled list

team_member_start_date.title: Joined service date
team_member_start_date.description: A date to indicate when a given person joined the team working on a given service.

team_member_end_date.title: Left service date
team_member_end_date.description: A date to indicate when a given person left the team working on a given service.

link_url.description: A related resolvable URL not covered by the other fields

link_type.description: A simple definition of the type or purpose of the link.

reference_citation.title: Citation
reference_citation.description: The formatted details for the given reference.

reference_type.description: A simple definition of the type, role or purpose of the reference.

service_example_outputs.title: Example Output Dataset
service_example_outputs.description: Services that generate data can provide PIDs/URLs for example datasets to demonstrate what types of data and information will be created.

service_version.title: Service Version
service_version.description: Service develop over time with changes of equipment, software, personnel, etc. Version numbers should be changed to indicate these changes - please note very large scale changes may warrant the creation of a new Service record to clarify differences in the data or results created.

service_version_date.title: Service Version Date
service_version_date.description: The version date is the date from which this particular version of this Service was offered in a formal capacity by the defined Access provider.

service_creation_date.title: Service Creation Date
service_creation_date.description: The creation date is the date from which this particular Service was offered in a formal capacity by the defined Access provider.

service_further_comments.title: Other Comments
service_further_comments.description: Free text opportunity to advocate for what is novel or special about this particular access

service_keywords.title: Service keywords
service_keywords.description: Additional terms and concepts not covered by the other fields, it would be good to reference these to some form of open vocabulary
